Grammar errors, but really, compared to the one with Chinese subs underneath, ANF's releases are gold.

Terrible English. Tons of grammar mistakes, they often use the present tense of a word when they were supposed to use the past tense. They also often use the incorrect word, simply because it sounds similar to the correct word.
Bad Comments: Saizen > Crunchyroll >>> ANF.  Watch Saizen for the first 26, then stick with Crunchyroll.  ANF's translations are terrible compared to CR.
Appreciate the effort, but the bad grammar is often very distracting. Sometimes straight up mistranslations. Too bad they're the ones with the best video qualtiy.
First few eps aren't that good, but they get better.
Good image quality, soft-subbed, with different languages.
The best available English fansub for this anime
Terrible translation and so many grammar mistakes it's not even funny...
